newsitem.title: SPAIN: Repsol maximum retail price set at 6,327pta.
newsitem.headline: Repsol maximum retail price set at 6,327pta.

text.p: The price which retail investors will pay for shares in Spanish energy group Repsol SA, to be set later on Monday by state holding company SEPI, cannot exceed 6,327 pesetas, according to the conditions in the offer prospectus.

The prospectus says the maximum share price "cannot be higher than the high of the average weighted traded price in the bourse session on which it is fixed and in the four previous sessions on the Spanish continuous market."
Today's weighted average, the highest of the last five sessions, was 6,327 pesetas according to the stock market authorities.
Spain is selling its last 10.0 percent stake in the energy group this month.
